name: Lust Theory
storyline: You take control of a guy living with three beautiful women. You live a pretty ordinary life... You go to school, do your chores, study for college, play games, watch TV. And then, the same day starts repeating and repeating and... Repeating.
summary: Lust Theory is an adult Visual Novel in which you take control of a 20 year old guy whose life is turned up side down when he finds out that the same day is repeating. The game is packed with sex, humor, romance, drama and mystery.
